descHumanitarianObjective.en: Humanitarian objective of program is such and such.

en.registered:
This is a message from the Red Cross.

We have received your application for support.

You will receive another SMS message with more information within [variable].
en.included:
This is a message from the Red Cross.

Your application to the Red Cross program has been successful and confirmed.

You will receive another message about your first Albert Heijn supermarket voucher within [variable].
en.rejected:
This is a message from the Red Cross.

Your application to the program has not been successful and cannot be confirmed.

If you can, please reach out to us on WhatsApp for more information: [+31600000000]

label.en:
Your V-number consists of 10 numbers. You can find it on your (former) permit of stay or on a letter from the IND.

If you canâ€™t find your V-Number, please contact the Rode Kruis helpdesk via WhatsApp on: +31 6 00 00 00 00

Please enter your V-Number:

Please share the phone number that you can receive an SMS on. We will use this phone number to inform you on the aid program.

It should look like: +31 6 00 00 00 00
